mapper.select: select id, server_id as serverId, receiver_names as receiverNames, title, content, attachments, jb, yb, delay_hours as delayHours, create_time as createTime, user_name as userName, global_send as globalSend, state from system_email where global_send is not null and state in (1,2) and state = #{state} and global_send = #{globalSend} and title like concat('%',#{title},'%') and date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= #{startTime} and date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= #{endTime} order by create_time desc

SELECT id, server_id as serverId, receiver_names receiverNames, title, content, attachments, jb, yb, delay_hours as delayHours, create_time as createTime, user_name as userName, global_send as globalSend, state FROM system_email where state = 1 and id in #{item}
mapper.insert: insert into system_email( server_id, receiver_names, title, content, attachments, jb, yb, delay_hours, create_time, user_name, create_by, state, global_send )values( #{serverId}, #{receiverNames}, #{title}, #{content}, #{attachments}, #{jb}, #{yb}, #{delayHours}, #{createTime}, #{userName}, #{createBy}, #{state}, #{globalSend} )
